GetPlayerNumber() GetPlayerNumberPhoton.Pun.UtilityScripts.PlayerNumberingExtensions Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.PlayerNumberingExtensionsGetPlayerNumber
static int Photon.Pun.UtilityScripts.PlayerNumberingExtensions.GetPlayerNumber (this Player player)[static]
Extension for Player class to wrap up access to the player's custom property.
Make sure you use the delegate 'OnPlayerNumberingChanged' to knoiw when you can query the PlayerNumber. Numbering can changes over time or not be yet assigned during the initial phase ( when player creates a room for example)
Returns
persistent index in room. -1 for no indexing
